Text.Page: I heard that you're headed toward Mistmoor Island. Those damned slavers! I managed to escape, but they took my brother. I have to save him before they take him to a slave market and sell him! He yelled out for me to run as they dragged him away.<NEXTPAGEBUTTON>"Where'd they take him?"</NEXTPAGEBUTTON>
They headed east. The market's called the Rain Cages. I can't remember anything else. Please, I beg you. Bring my brother back.

Who are you? Are you a soldier? Have you seen my brother, Zebulon, by any chance?

He's alive? What a relief.

I need a key so I can get out of here. See if you can pinch a key from the {@LinkCreature:12#16#slave watchers}. Don't know which is which, so bring me a few.

I'll be hiding back here. And, please stay alive.

So good to be free! Tell our mother we're safe, won't you?

Also, here's a tip: you'll save yourself a lot of drama if you tell my mother that we promised not to associate with Dirken anymore. I think he set us up to fail!
Hurry, <PCCLASS:lcase>! If the slavers catch you, they'll lock you up, too!

They're alive? Both of them? Oh, thank the titans!

But oh, when those boys get home...how dare they make me worry so? And consorting with the likes of Dirken? Did they listen to nothing I told them?

If only they were more like you, . You're the perfect example of what happens when you heed the wisdom of your parents.

You've honored Kaia's Sword through deed and example. You've honored this place with resolute dedication as well.

So today, we honor a peerless in our ranks.

Go forth, , and know that you'll always have a place in the regiment.
